sentences.en: A man must despise himself before others will.
Don't feel ashamed — we don't despise the widow's mite , and, as they say, every penny helps.
sentences.cn: 不用觉得不好意思——我们不会瞧不起微薄但可贵的捐赠的, 正如人们说的, 每一文钱都会起作用.

sentences.en: He too could smile at Herzog and despise him.
sentences.cn: 他也象别人一样嘲笑赫索格,奚落赫索格.

sentences.en: He would exult over me and despise me.
sentences.cn: 他对我耀武扬威,不屑一顾.

sentences.en: Honest boys despise lies and liars.
sentences.cn: 诚实的孩子鄙视谎言和说谎者.

sentences.en: I can never, ever forgive him. I despise him.
sentences.cn: 我永远不会原谅他。我鄙视他。

sentences.en: I despise such people; they've no character.
sentences.cn: 我藐视这种人, 他们没骨气.

sentences.en: I have nothing but contempt for the people who despise money.
sentences.cn: 我就是看不惯那些对金钱不屑一顾的人.

sentences.en: It is incorrect to despise woman.
It's a poor little place. My relations despise it.
sentences.cn: 这是个又小又破的住处. 我的亲属们看不上眼.

sentences.en: Strategically we should despise all our enemies, but tactically we should take them all seriously.
sentences.cn: 在战略上我们要藐视一切敌人, 在战术上我们要重视一切敌人.

sentences.en: The townsmen despise and cheat the nomads.
sentences.cn: 城镇居民轻视和诈骗游牧民.

sentences.en: We should not despise our intellectual inferiors.
sentences.cn: 我们不应轻视智力不如我们的人.

sentences.en: We should not despise plain features, nor a laborious yet honest occupation.
sentences.cn: 我们不应该看不起相貌平常的人, 也不应该看不起辛苦而正直的职业.

words.tran_cn: 轻视（despise的过去分词）；看不起

trans.tran_en: to dislike and have a low opinion of someone or something
to dislike and have a low opinion of someone or something
